1. AI lie detectors are better than humans at spotting lies  MIT Technology Review
  2. The Download: AI agents, and how to detect a lie  MIT Technology Review
  3. AI Increases Lie Accusations, Changing How We Trust and Detect Deception  Neuroscience News
  4. Truth, deception, and the future of AI lie detection machines  Earth.com
  5. Lie-detection AI could provoke people into making careless accusations, researchers warn  Phys.org
